item.title: About David Smith
item.description: This is my about page. Add more detail for details about the Tranquil refer to the USer and Developer doc User - https://github.com/dpsmith005/Repo1Test/blob/main/user.mdDeveloper - https://github.com/dpsmith005/Repo1Test/blob/main/developer.mdAnd the site dochttps://github.com/kakawait/hugo-tranquilpeak-theme/blob/master/docs/user.md#headerin powershell run this command to add git to the path $env:PATH = $env:PATH + “;C:\Program Files\Git\cmd” run hugo to create the public folder set the path to include git $env:PATH = $env:PATH + “;C:\Program Files\Git\cmd” run the following git commands to from the public folder to push the web site cd C:\hugo\Sites\TranquilTest\public git init git add .

item.title: Sample Code Block
item.description: below is a code sample # test powershell script Write-host "Hello World"; $service = Get-Service $service | select Name The above code should be in a block
